is_unit_exp:
theorem is_unit_exp (A : matrix m m 𝔸) : is_unit (exp 𝕂 A) :=
  by
  letI : semi_normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_semi_normed_ring
  letI : normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_ring
  letI : normed_algebra 𝕂 (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_algebra
  exact is_unit_exp _ A
#align is_unit_exp is_unit_exp
exp_zsmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem exp_zsmul (z : ℤ) (A : matrix m m 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 («expr • » z A) = exp 𝕂 A ^ z :=
  by
  obtain ⟨n, rfl | rfl⟩ := z.eq_coe_or_neg
  · rw [zpow_ofNat, coe_nat_zsmul, exp_nsmul]
  · have : is_unit (exp 𝕂 A).det := (matrix.is_unit_iff_is_unit_det _).mp (is_unit_exp _ _)
    rw [matrix.zpow_neg this, zpow_ofNat, neg_smul, exp_neg, coe_nat_zsmul, exp_nsmul]
#align exp_zsmul exp_zsmul
exp_units_conj':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ˣ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem exp_units_conj' (U : «expr ˣ» (matrix m m 𝔸)) (A : matrix m m 𝔸) :
    exp 𝕂 (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (↑U⁻¹) A) U : matrix m m 𝔸) = matrix.mul (matrix.mul (↑U⁻¹) (exp 𝕂 A)) U :=
  exp_units_conj 𝕂 U⁻¹ A
#align exp_units_conj' exp_units_conj'
exp_units_conj:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ˣ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem exp_units_conj (U : «expr ˣ» (matrix m m 𝔸)) (A : matrix m m 𝔸) :
    exp 𝕂 (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (↑U) A) ↑U⁻¹ : matrix m m 𝔸) = matrix.mul (matrix.mul (↑U) (exp 𝕂 A)) ↑U⁻¹ :=
  by
  letI : semi_normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_semi_normed_ring
  letI : normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_ring
  letI : normed_algebra 𝕂 (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_algebra
  exact exp_units_conj _ U A
#align exp_units_conj exp_units_conj
exp_transpose:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem exp_transpose (A : matrix m m 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 (matrix.transpose A) = matrix.transpose (exp 𝕂 A) := by
  simp_rw [exp_eq_tsum, transpose_tsum, transpose_smul, transpose_pow]
#align exp_transpose exp_transpose
exp_sum_of_commute:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem exp_sum_of_commute {ι} (s : Finset ι) (f : ι → matrix m m 𝔸)
    (h : (s : set ι).pairwise fun i j => Commute (f i) (f j)) :
    exp 𝕂 (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (f i)) =
      s.noncomm_prod (fun i => exp 𝕂 (f i)) fun i hi j hj _ => (h.of_refl hi hj).exp 𝕂 :=
  by
  letI : semi_normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_semi_normed_ring
  letI : normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_ring
  letI : normed_algebra 𝕂 (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_algebra
  exact exp_sum_of_commute s f h
#align exp_sum_of_commute exp_sum_of_commute
exp_nsmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem exp_nsmul (n : ℕ) (A : matrix m m 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 («expr • » n A) = exp 𝕂 A ^ n :=
  by
  letI : semi_normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_semi_normed_ring
  letI : normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_ring
  letI : normed_algebra 𝕂 (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_algebra
  exact exp_nsmul n A
#align exp_nsmul exp_nsmul
exp_neg:
theorem exp_neg (A : matrix m m 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 (-A) = (exp 𝕂 A)⁻¹ :=
  by
  rw [nonsing_inv_eq_ring_inverse]
  letI : semi_normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_semi_normed_ring
  letI : normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_ring
  letI : normed_algebra 𝕂 (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_algebra
  exact (ring.inverse_exp _ A).symm
#align exp_neg exp_neg
exp_diagonal:

theorem exp_diagonal (v : m → 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 (diagonal v) = diagonal (exp 𝕂 v) := by
  simp_rw [exp_eq_tsum, diagonal_pow, ← diagonal_smul, ← diagonal_tsum]
#align exp_diagonal exp_diagonal
exp_conj_transpose:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
theorem exp_conj_transpose [StarRing 𝔸] [has_continuous_star 𝔸] (A : matrix m m 𝔸) :
    exp 𝕂 (matrix.conj_transpose A) = matrix.conj_transpose (exp 𝕂 A) :=
  (star_exp A).symm
#align exp_conj_transpose exp_conj_transpose
exp_conj':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem exp_conj' (U : matrix m m 𝔸) (A : matrix m m 𝔸) (hy : is_unit U) :
    exp 𝕂 (matrix.mul (matrix.mul U⁻¹ A) U) = matrix.mul (matrix.mul U⁻¹ (exp 𝕂 A)) U :=
  let ⟨u, hu⟩ := hy
  hu ▸ by simpa only [matrix.coe_units_inv] using exp_units_conj' 𝕂 u A
#align exp_conj' exp_conj'
exp_conj:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem exp_conj (U : matrix m m 𝔸) (A : matrix m m 𝔸) (hy : is_unit U) :
    exp 𝕂 (matrix.mul (matrix.mul U A) U⁻¹) = matrix.mul (matrix.mul U (exp 𝕂 A)) U⁻¹ :=
  let ⟨u, hu⟩ := hy
  hu ▸ by simpa only [matrix.coe_units_inv] using exp_units_conj 𝕂 u A
#align exp_conj exp_conj
exp_block_diagonal':
theorem exp_block_diagonal' (v : ∀ i, matrix (n' i) (n' i) 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 (block_diagonal' v) = block_diagonal' (exp 𝕂 v) :=
  by simp_rw [exp_eq_tsum, ← block_diagonal'_pow, ← block_diagonal'_smul, ← block_diagonal'_tsum]
#align exp_block_diagonal' exp_block_diagonal'
exp_block_diagonal:
theorem exp_block_diagonal (v : m → matrix n n 𝔸) : exp 𝕂 (block_diagonal v) = block_diagonal (exp 𝕂 v) := by
  simp_rw [exp_eq_tsum, ← block_diagonal_pow, ← block_diagonal_smul, ← block_diagonal_tsum]
#align exp_block_diagonal exp_block_diagonal
exp_add_of_commute:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem exp_add_of_commute (A B : matrix m m 𝔸) (h : Commute A B) : exp 𝕂 (A + B) = matrix.mul (exp 𝕂 A) (exp 𝕂 B) :=
  by
  letI : semi_normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_semi_normed_ring
  letI : normed_ring (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_ring
  letI : normed_algebra 𝕂 (matrix m m 𝔸) := matrix.linfty_op_normed_algebra
  exact exp_add_of_commute h
#align exp_add_of_commute exp_add_of_commute
